attributes.action: let the public decide who goes in the big brother house and not the producers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i have been trying to get into the big brother house since the start.i go to each and every audition and get a good response from the public with the banter and things i get them to do while they are queing i can interact with them but it seems not the production company, seems am to old (38!) not good looking enough or to much for them even though they know how much i have put in to get on the show!!
it should be the public who decides who goes in as well as out!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
